description: This contract role requires a skilled Full Stack Developer with a strong focus on front-end development (70%) to join a team in Trivandrum immediately.  The candidate will be responsible for building and maintaining high-quality, scalable applications.  Experience with Angular, TypeScript, and related technologies is critical.  Backend responsibilities (30%) include Java, Spring Boot, and microservices.
responsibilities: Develop and maintain front-end components using Angular, HTML, CSS, and TypeScript.
Design and implement user interfaces using Bootstrap and other UI frameworks.
Collaborate with backend developers to integrate front-end components with APIs and services.
Debug and troubleshoot front-end code and applications.
Develop, test, and implement front-end features using RXJS and NGRX.
Develop and maintain back-end components using Java, Spring Boot, and microservices architecture.
Design and implement cloud-native solutions utilizing GCP.
Deploy and release software using CI/CD pipelines, including Jenkins, Helm Charts, and Terraform.
Troubleshoot and resolve issues with cloud infrastructure.
Ensure applications meet quality standards with unit testing using Jasmine/Karma and automated testing tools.
Work within agile methodologies like Scrum and XP.
Effectively use Atlassian tools like JIRA, Confluence, and GitHub.
Work with relational databases (SQL Server, MySQL) and potentially other relevant database systems
who_you_are: A highly proficient Full Stack Developer with a minimum of 6+ years of experience in Angular.
Experienced in designing and developing cloud-native solutions using GCP or other Cloud providers.
A strong understanding of front-end technologies and frameworks, including Angular, HTML, CSS, TypeScript, and Bootstrap, with demonstrated expertise in applying these skills.
A skilled backend developer with experience in Java, Spring Boot, and microservices architectures.
Proven ability to write, debug, and troubleshoot complex code in multiple languages.
Expert in UI development using HTML, JavaScript, Angular and Bootstrap.
Proficient in using automated testing frameworks (Jasmine, Karma, JUnit, Selenium, etc.).
Experienced working in agile software development environments.
Comfortable utilizing Atlassian tools (JIRA, Confluence, GitHub).
Possessing a strong understanding of CI/CD pipelines and Infrastructure as Code (IaC) concepts.
nice_to_haves: Experience with other front-end technologies, such as React or Vue.js.
Experience with AWS or Azure cloud technologies.
Familiarity with UI/UX design principles and practices.
Knowledge of various database technologies beyond relational databases.
Understanding of DevOps principles and practices.
Knowledge of more advanced Angular concepts and architectures (e.g. Ivy or Angular Universal).
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills for tackling complex technical challenges.
